document.full_text: the theater company will present "the columnist," david auburn's first broadway drama since "proof," as well as "we live here," a new play by zoe kazan, and "close up space," a new comedy featuring david hyde pierce.
document.title: manhattan theater club announces its new season
lines_and_colors: the theater company will present "the columnist," david auburn's first broadway drama since "proof," as well as "we live here," a new play by zoe kazan, and "close up space," a new comedy featuring david hyde pierce.
